Random ramblings

Dark side of the Lens

  • Jan 20 2011
  • Tagged inspiration

It has been a while since I first added this to “My Likes” on Vimeo. No clue why I forgot to post it on my website… A really inspiring video by a true artist with a passion everyone should envy. Nothing but amazing how this guys captures angles, frames, tells his story and creates an absolutely beautiful video.

Animated shortfilm "Fallen"

  • Sep 30 2010
  • Tagged inspiration

A short and very moving story about a small meteor heading towards earth, facing the inevitable fact of life on it’s way down to Earth. I absolutely loved the simplicity of the story and it sure got me thinking: “Just let go…”

Fallen" from Sascha Geddert

Source: LikeCool.com

Amazing painting by Supakitch & Koralie

  • Sep 30 2010
  • Tagged inspiration

Just bumped into this video this morning and was amazed by the dedication and details these guys put into their work! I wanna be this talented when I grow up :) Beautifully cut video mixed with some nice music.

Supakitch & Koralie – Världskultur Museet Göteborg From Elr°y

Source: KoiKoiKok

Travel journal from South East Asia 2010

  • Sep 28 2010
  • Tagged travel
  • Part 1. Arriving in Bangkok and going to Chiang Mai
  • Part 2. Finishing school and leaving Chiang Mai
  • Part 3. Vietnam and the Philippines

So…! Only 7 days left in DK before I pack my bags and head to Thailand! I must admit I’m a bit excited :) I am planning to keep my family and friends up-to-date by keeping a journal and posting some pictures here on my webpage whenever I can find the time – so feel free to drop by anytime and check for updates. I’ll try to post updates on Facebook as well to help the lazy ones.

To those of you who somehow missed out on the fact that I am leaving and the ones I forgot to tell here is the plan for the trip:

  • Arriving in Bangkok (6/10/2010) and staying there for 3-4 days
  • Heading to Chiang Mai for a 5 week thai massage course . Hopefully with a lot of spare time to hike, exercise and meditate = enjoy life.
  • Travel Asia for 3 months – including a lot of kitesurfing :)

Read the rest of this entry »

Crossfit Journal 11/09/2010

  • Sep 11 2010
  • Tagged training

Challenge WOD

20 min. AMRAP

  • 5 x 40 kg thrusters
  • 7 × 40 kg hang clean
  • 10 × 40 kg shdp

Result: 7 rounds

Felt a bit tired today from yesterdays rowing and biking… and those thrusters didn’t do anything good for my legs ;)

Concept art of Mikael Lugnegaard

  • Sep 06 2010
  • Tagged art design inspiration

This guy has some really amazing design and rendering skills! Usually concept cars and bikes get a bit to futuristic for my likings but Mikael Lugnegård somehow rides the edge between realism and concept – and the results are some insanely beautifully rendered super cars and bikes. You should check it out…

Crossfit journal 03/09/2010

  • Sep 05 2010
  • Tagged training

Challenge WOD – “Fight gone bad”

3 rounds of:

  • 1 min. wallball
  • 1 min. 30 kg shdp
  • 1 min. boxjumps
  • 1 min. 30 kg shoulder press
  • 1 min. row (calories count)

Result: 268

Bionic does "Fran" in 1:58

  • Sep 03 2010
  • Tagged training inspiration

This guy is AMAZING! He completes Fran with some pretty awesome thrusters in 1:58 :D Usually people doing these videoes tend to cheat a bit on the pullups (at least in my opinion) by not getting their chin convincingly above the bar – but this guy almost does chest to bar at times! Really inspiring stuff…
